explanation:
code_hardening: Declared the method static, added a null-check for the reflected Method, and ensured all failure paths return null without placeholder strings.
resolve_compilation_errors: Changed the return type from CharSequence to String and relied on existing static constants (SELECT_RUNTIME_PROPERTY, LIB_DALVIK, LIB_ART, LIB_ART_D) already defined in the class.
exception_handling: Unified handling of ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, and InvocationTargetException so that each simply returns null.
logic_customization: Preserved the successful runtime value mapping logic (Dalvik, ART, ART debug build, or raw value) and kept the reflection-based lookup intact while invoking the static SystemProperties.get method correctly.
refactoring: Removed all diagnostic and descriptive error strings and streamlined the nested try/catch structure without altering functional behavior.
misc: none
